features: POWERFUL MAGNIFICATION: 20X magnifying mirror is the most powerful mirror,the pores of the face are clearly visible which is good for check makeup detail.
DETAIL MAGNIFICATION FUNCTION: 20x magnifying mirror can reflect local details better than 15x and 10x, and can correct and optimize facial care.

EASY TO USE: The 20x magnified mirror has 3 suction cups, which are simple and firm to install, and can be easily removed repeatedly when traveling. When adsorbing the suction cup, it is necessary to squeeze the mirror surface appropriately to achieve a complete adsorption effect.

GIFT IDEA: This magnifying mirror suction cup is a good choice for any woman, girlfriend, wife, daughter or sister who cares about looking good whether at home or on the go. Amazing gift for Christmas, New Year or Birthday.
KINDLY NOTE: The 20X magnification is very powerful and best focus achieved 3-3.5 Inches from face.Upside down or distorted image from far away is normal.
body.description: Here's Why Choose JMH 20X Magnifying Mirror with Suction Cup for your bathroom or travel. ●20X Magnifying Mirror 20X magnification helps you to see the details on your face clearly, helps you make sure everything on your face is exactly how and where it should be. ●High Quality Clear Frame Stylish acrylic frame compare glass frame more durable and beautiful. ●Easy Mounting with 3 Suction Cups Make sure the suction cups are fully affixed at a comfortable height and can easily remove to take it on trips. ●Handheld Makeup Mirror This mirror can also be unmounted to use hand held. ●Portable Travel Mirror Mirror can be remounted repeatedly so you can take it with travel and also can to use hand held.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for applying makeup. No distortion at all with this high powered magnification!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mirror. It’s the perfect size, very light weight, absolutely no distortion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a fabulous find!! Great quality and easy to use..an essential in my travel make up bag would definitely purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good magnifying Mirror
reviews.reviewText: I like the strength of the magnifying - makes it much easier for me to see what I need to.It has 3 suction cups on the back which seem to hold for about 1 hour, by then all 3 have let go and the mirror will fall. I have forgotten to remove it and place it in a safe area twice, both time it fell off and scared me (but it hasn't broken yet). I am happy with my purchase and simply need to learn to put it away instead of thinking it will stay put. As I said it hasn't broken even after falling, so I have to say it is very sturdy and a great travel size.I did receive it on time and in great shape. If I do break it I will order it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The assembly of product is very poor. Needs to be glued well. Easy to fall and brake.First one broke and this is the replacement. I am glad I checked it before!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't stick to window or mirrow
reviews.reviewText: Let's just say that I am in the market for a new mirror. Just received this one; when I went to install (ha) it would not stay. I tried getting it wet, normal procedure, then drying it off. Tried the window and then the full length mirror. Finally decided to leave it on the window when it fell and broke! Needless to say I will not be buying this type again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror but broke easy
reviews.reviewText: Great mirror but shattered to easy and pieces flew across the room ! Not easy to get suction cups off the mirror and that's how it broke . I bought two of these..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product came on the expected date. Great size and price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome small magnifying mirror
reviews.reviewText: Great for at home or travel. Suction cups work well. Magnification is great!
The mirror was fantastic for applying eyeliner and mascaraFantastic for tweezing browsUnfortunately the suction caps kept failing and today the mirror came off again and smashed
